name: Joe & Mac 2: Lost in the Tropics
overview: Our heroes, Joe and Mac, have volunteered to search for their leader's crown and bring it back so that peace can be restored. Of course, they're not risking their lives just out of the goodness of their hearts - they're out to impress the cave-babes, too! Still it's Joe and Mac. They may have a little problem with navigation. They'd better be careful not to get lost...
